description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nPrismagic:
This creature can equip 3 additional Spell Gems, and it can equip spells from any class. Your creatures with {CONDNAME_BUFF_ARCANE} {ACTION_cast} spells with 15% more {STAT_intelligence} for each different class of spell this creature has equipped. This trait does not stack.
name: Rainbow Prism
